document.full_text: bayer cropscience said that it was abandoning plans to resume production in west virginia of a toxic chemical that killed thousands of people in india in the world's deadliest industrial disaster.
document.title: mid-atlantic: west virginia: bayer ends toxic chemical production
lines_and_colors: bayer cropscience said that it was abandoning plans to resume production in west virginia of a toxic chemical that killed thousands of people in india in the world's deadliest industrial disaster.
